articles.title: First coronavirus-related death reported at South Tyneside's hospital trust in two days as four more cases confirmed in borough - Shields Gazette
articles.description: Three more patients being treated by South Tyneside’s hospital trust have died after testing positive for coronavirus, figures from NHS England have confirmed, though there have been no new cases reported in the borough.
